__e: Why are you so frightened by what you saw?

I really don't want you to be alarmed... by what, uh, I'm going to talk to you about now.
Sometimes it scares me to think... where it's coming from, you know?

Look, I know I freaked you out by moving too fast... with all that "I love you" stuff.
I'm sorry if I've shocked you. But there's no one else I could talk to about it, and when you came in, I...

Let's see if we can scare him out of here.
They ain't gonna run me off.
